name: DIIO:DEMO
description:
Hello guys, i'm Fresh earth  live in korea!

when i developed this game, I'm 15age !

So my english skill is not good in that time, but please enjoy my game!

One day, I woke up from my dream, but it was a different world from the world where I lived!

HELLO! MY NAME IS FRESH EARTH!

NICE TO MEET YOU!

UM... I'M IN THE GAME!

LOOK FOR ME!

Easter Eggs? ... Look for it!

This game has two ending.

한국분이시라면 DIIO_KOR 로 다운받아주셔요
